document_data.name: Belargh Thulin
document_data.mainbody: '''Belargh Thulin''' was a male [[wizard]] who was one of the [[magelord]]s of [[Athalantar]] and was killed by [[Elminster Aumar]] early in his insurrection.
document_data.Personality: He was a minor magelord, known for devoting his time to romancing all women who came within range of his eye (and his magical compulsions) in rural [[Ambletrees]].
document_data.History: He was killed by Elminster in [[234 DR]] when he, in the feminine form of Elmara, escaped from Athalantar.
